HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Tentatively updated for RimWorld 1.6. Please report any issues you find. Previous problems with log spam and GUI elements interfering with vanilla UI should be resolved. I removed the dependency for Fluffy's old colour picker mod and replaced it with the vanilla color picker, but it only allows predefined colors. For now the available colors are hard-coded. There is also a new toggle in the bottom right buttons that hides all labels at once. Use this if you have a large colony and the number of labels is actually causing a performance problem, or if you just want to de-clutter.
NOTE: New fixes/improvements are ONLY for RimWorld 1.4-1.6. If you're still playing on 1.3 or earlier (why?) you should see no change.

Improved the experience of changing a pawn's label settings. Also added better compatibility with some other nice Colonist Bar mods. |img:LabelOptionsDialog|caption:New dialog allows better customization for individual pawns' labels. |img:LabelOptionsButton_BioTab|caption:(Optional) New button in pawns' Bio tabs to access the new dialog. |img:LabelOptionsButton_NamePawn|caption:(Optional) New button in pawn Rename dialog to access the new dialog. |New Feature: You can now change a pawn's name color in labels. |img:PawnName|caption:Custom name colors show over the pawn's world sprite in addition to the Colonist Bar. |New Feature: Added a new "Patches" tab to the mod settings where you can disable/enable specific Harmony patches from this mod. This feature is intended for advanced users, but allows you to fine-tune exactly how much this mod actually does to suit your needs.
